community.question: Where can i purchase the West europe Listing Plan: Complete Standard Package?
community.description: Hello everyone, I have a problem. I would like to book the “Complete Standard Package” listing package. After entering my card details, I am redirected to where I am supposed to add my first set of data. I am asked to enter my phone number, but unfortunately, no matter how I enter it (+49…, 0049…, 089…), I get the error message “Number not Valid.” Am I doing something wrong? Could it be that the Yext link I am using is only for booking a package in America? https://www.yext.com/pl/powerlistings/plans.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=brand_smb_ar&utm_campaign=brand&mkt_tok=OTA2LUlCQS0zNTMAAAGKIuw2NF_MjIg0blfPJUqQuOJvzew0Ld8tn2GCculpWct4nNy19wcb9fB0Jqd3JbIpnB2unLHmpZxZVKcgNWS9-uHL-yPwNJ1Gnz9Z0zxnXKqpo1c If yes, where can I find the package for Western Europe? I would appreciate any help with this. Best regards, Christian
